alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Eastern Lincoln County; Northeast Highlands; South Central Highlands; South Central Mountains; Southwest Chaves County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 12 at 6:32AM MST until December 12 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Central Highlands, Eastern Lincoln County, South Central Highlands, South Central Mountains, Northeast Highlands, and Southwest Chaves County. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down weakened trees and branches. Localized power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Blowing snow can also reduce visibility through the higher elevations of the Sacramento Mountains, South-Central Highlands, and Central Highlands this afternoon and evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds will begin this morning, but the strongest winds are not expected until this afternoon.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects including inflatable Christmas decorations. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; Eastern Lincoln County; Northeast Highlands; South Central Highlands; South Central Mountains; Southwest Chaves County
